message.raw:
recovering initial user gui camera position, e.g.

  <rendering:gui>
    <type>fltk</type>
    <size>480 320</size>
    <pos>0 0</pos>
    <frames>
      <row height="100%">
        <camera width="100%">
          <xyz>0.3 0 3</xyz>
          <rpy>0 90 90</rpy>
        </camera>
      </row>
    </frames>
  </rendering:gui>
message.html:
recovering initial user gui camera position, e.g.

<rendering:gui>
<type>fltk</type>
<size>480 320</size>
<pos>0 0</pos>
<frames>
<row height="100%">
<camera width="100%">
<xyz>0.3 0 3</xyz>
<rpy>0 90 90</rpy>
</camera>
</row>
</frames>
</rendering:gui>

message:
recovering initial user gui camera position, e.g.

  <rendering:gui>
    <type>fltk</type>
    <size>480 320</size>
    <pos>0 0</pos>
    <frames>
      <row height="100%">
